
---

---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Use this data source to access information about an existing Shared Image within a Shared Image Gallery.


{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}

{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Azure = Pulumi.Azure;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example = Output.Create(Azure.Compute.GetSharedImage.InvokeAsync(new Azure.Compute.GetSharedImageArgs
        {
            GalleryName = "my-image-gallery",
            Name = "my-image",
            ResourceGroupName = "example-resources",
        }));
    }

}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example go %}}
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure/sdk/v3/go/azure/compute"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v2/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := compute.LookupSharedImage(ctx, &compute.LookupSharedImageArgs{
			GalleryName:       "my-image-gallery",
			Name:              "my-image",
			ResourceGroupName: "example-resources",
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example python %}}
```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_azure as azure

example = azure.compute.get_shared_image(gallery_name="my-image-gallery",
    name="my-image",
    resource_group_name="example-resources")
```

{{% /example %}}

{{% example typescript %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as azure from "@pulumi/azure";

const example = pulumi.output(azure.compute.getSharedImage({
    galleryName: "my-image-gallery",
    name: "my-image",
    resourceGroupName: "example-resources",
}, { async: true }));
```
